Package ca.retrylife.inputlib

Class Prompt

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.retrylife.inputlib.Prompt
  • public class Prompt
extends java.lang.Object
    Prompt is the primary class of InputLib. All general functions are provided here, and it wraps many annoying type-safety checks in simple functions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Prompt()
      Create a Prompt using stdin/stdout for I/O
      Prompt​(java.io.InputStream in, java.io.PrintStream out)
      Create a Prompt from two streams

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean promptBoolean​(java.lang.String prompt)
      Prompt a boolean from the user (This can be one of: yes, no, true, false, accept, deny)

      Prompt a boolean from the user (This can be one of: yes, no, true, false, accept, deny)
